Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Class CoordRequestManager

java.lang.Object
controllers.CoordRequestManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoordRequestManager
public class CoordRequestManager extends Object implements ICoordRequestManager
This class is the manager for the requests made by the coordinator. It implements the ICoordRequestManager interface.
